Event.Message: The HCAP Server started successfully.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: The HCAP Server stopped successfully.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: The HCAP Server failed to start.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: The HCAP Server failed to stop.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message:
The HCAP Server cannot contact the NPS Server.
HCAP client host name: %1 HCAP client IP address: %2 Request ID: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HostName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostIP" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RequestID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
The NPS server rejected the connection request.
HCAP client host name: %1 HCAP client IP address: %2 Request ID: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HostName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostIP" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RequestID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
The HCAP Request is malformed.
HCAP client host name: %1 HCAP client IP address: %2 Request ID: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HostName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostIP" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RequestID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
The HCAP Request code %1 is unknown.
HCAP client host name: %2 HCAP client IP address: %3 Request ID: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RequestCode" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostIP" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RequestID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
The HCAP Request type %1 is unknown.
HCAP client host name: %2 HCAP client IP address: %3 Request ID: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RequestType" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostIP" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RequestID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
The HCAP Request version %1 is not supported.
HCAP client host name: %2 HCAP client IP address: %3 Request ID: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Version" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostIP" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RequestID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
The HCAP Request had no TLVs when at least one was expected.
HCAP client host name: %1 HCAP client IP address: %2 Request ID: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HostName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostIP" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RequestID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
The HCAP Request TLV %1 is malformed.
HCAP client host name: %2 HCAP client IP address: %3 Request ID: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MalformedTLV" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostIP" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RequestID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
The HCAP Request TLV type is not supported.
Unsupported TLVs: %1 HCAP client host name: %2 HCAP client IP address: %3 Request ID: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TLVs" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostIP" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RequestID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
The HCAP Request did not have SOH TLV.
HCAP client host name: %1 HCAP client IP address: %2 Request ID: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HostName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostIP" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RequestID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
The HCAP server could not match the HCAP Request against any Network Policy.
HCAP client host name: %1 HCAP client IP address: %2 Request ID: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HostName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostIP" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RequestID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
The HCAP server did not get a response from Network Policy Server.
HCAP client host name: %1 HCAP client IP address: %2 Request ID: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HostName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostIP" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RequestID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
The HCAP server encountered a general failure.
HCAP client host name: %1 HCAP client IP address: %2 Request ID: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HostName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostIP" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RequestID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
The NPS server encountered a general failure.
HCAP client host name: %1 HCAP client IP address: %2 Request ID: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HostName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostIP" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RequestID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
The HCAP server encountered an internal error.
HCAP client host name: %1 HCAP client IP address: %2 Request ID: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HostName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostIP" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RequestID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Successful HCAP Response was returned.
HCAP client host name: %1 HCAP client IP address: %2 Request ID: %3 Version: %4 User Name: %5 User Groups: %6 Endpoint ID: %7 Endpoint Location: %8 Endpoint IPv4 Address: %9 Endpoint IPv6 Address: %10 Posture State returned: %11 Extended State returned: %12
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HostName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostIP" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RequestID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Version" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserGroup" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="EndpointID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="EndpointLocation" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="EndpointIPv4Address" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="EndpointIPv6Address" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PostureState" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ExtendedPostureState" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Failure HCAP Response was returned with result code %1
HCAP client host name: %2 HCAP client IP address: %3 Request ID: %4 Version: %5 User Name: %6 User Groups: %7 Endpoint ID: %8 Endpoint Location: %9 Endpoint IPv4 Address: %10 Endpoint IPv6 Address: %11
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostIP" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RequestID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Version" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserGroup" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="EndpointID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="EndpointLocation" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="EndpointIPv4Address" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="EndpointIPv6Address" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
A failure response was sent. The HCAP Server sent Negatively Acknowledgment (NAK) for unsupported mandatory TLVs.
HCAP client host name: %1 HCAP client IP address: %2 Request ID: %3 Version: %4 User Name: %5 User Groups: %6 Endpoint ID: %7 Endpoint Location: %8 Endpoint IPv4 Address: %9 Endpoint IPv6 Address: %10
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HostName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HostIP" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RequestID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Version" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserGroup" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="EndpointID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="EndpointLocation" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="EndpointIPv4Address" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="EndpointIPv6Address" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
